resources.string: You are not connected to a device
Bluetooth was not enabled. Leaving Bluetooth Chat.

Instructions:
 Player - gray dot
 Opponent - orange dot
 Player destination - light gray dot.
 Opponent destination - light orange dot.
 Keys - yellow dot
 
 Use bottom line to move horizontally.
 Use left line to move vertically.
 The pointers indicates position of dot.
 Do NOT touch the walls of the maze. 
 
 Practice:
 Collect yellow keys to increment score or earn life.
 If you loose your life, earn a life by collecting keys.
 The cost of lives increases by one every time you loose life.
 You can not increase score unless you have one life.
 Touch on your dot to set-up a teleport point P.
 Touch on your dot again to teleport back to P.
 Make the highest score in a single streak.
 
 Challenge:
 Reach your destination before the opponent(computer).
 
 2-player:
 Allow blue-tooth request.
 Search for an opponent device and pair.
 Play the game.
